definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: prop removal, only found in the st. c. as

definitions.title: conj.
definitions.body: except, only, save that—cstr. [[זוּלַת]] 2Ki 24:14 and (with the obsolete case-ending [[י]]—[[ִ]]) [[זוּלָתִי]] De 1:36, De 4:12, Jos 11:13, 1Ki 3:18, 1Ki 12:20, Ps 18:32; with sf. [[זוּלָתִי]] Ho 13:4, Is 45:5, Is 45:21, [[זוּלָֽתְךָ]], [[זוּלָתֶָךְ]] 2Sa 7:22 = 1Ch 17:20, Is 26:13, Is 64:3, Ru 4:4, [[זוּלָתָהּ]] 1Sa 21:10; —

definitions.title: 1. prep.
definitions.body: except, besides, lit. with removal of… (syn. [[מִבַּלְעֲדֵי]] Ps 18:32, Is 45:21; [[בִּלְתִּי]] Ho 13:4; and cf. De 1:36 with Nu 32:12), De 1:36 [[זולתי כלב]] with the exception of Caleb, 1Sa 21:10 [[אֵין אַחֶרֶת זוּלָתָהּ]] there is none other except it, 1Ki 12:20, 2Ki 24:14, Ru 4:4: oft. in such phrases as, There is no God (or, Who is God?) except me (or thee), 2Sa 7:22, Ps 18:32, Ho 13:4, Is 45:5, Is 45:21, Is 64:3. Always after a neg. or qu., exc. Is 26:13 [[אדנים זולתך]] lords other than thou. Connected inexactly with what precedes, ´[[ז]] acquires the force of only, De 4:12 ye saw no form [[זוּלָתִי קוֹל]] save a voice = (there was) only a voice, 1Ki 3:18.
conj. Jos 11:13 except that he burnt Hazor alone.
